name: Jorge Villamil
description: '''Jorge Villamil Cordovez''' (June 6, 1929 – February 28, 2010) was a Colombian composer and songwriter born in El Cedral, a large coffee plantation near [[Neiva]] ([[Huila Department|Huila]]).  He was one of the most prolific and important composers of [[Colombia]] and South America.  Villamil's talent was evident when he learned to play Colombian [[tiple]] at 4 years of age. He was the youngest and only male of a family of 7.
